positive_examples: This is an example of calcite.
We observed calcite in this context.
A typical case of calcite would involve these features.
The concept of calcite applies here.
A calcium carbonate mineral that forms rhombohedral crystals and is a major component of limestone and marble.
negative_examples: This is an example of snowflake, not calcite.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Snowflake, or other types of Crystal

definition: A common carbonate mineral (CaCO3) found in limestone, marble, and shells.
